snippet: Mauricio Pochettino takes criticism from Southampton fans angry at him for joining Tottenham Hotspur as a compliment and urged midfielder Victor Wanyama to be braced for a rough welcome when he also returns to St Mary's on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Mauricio Pochettino takes criticism from Southampton fans angry at him for joining Tottenham Hotspur as a compliment and urged midfielder Victor Wanyama to be braced for a rough welcome when he also returns to St Mary's on Wednesday.

headline.main: Pochettino Regards Southampton Seethe as Mark of Respect
headline.print_headline: Pochettino Regards Southampton Seethe as Mark of Respect
